plot.content: Stippling technique made of 30'000 strokes plotted in 4.5 hours with fountain pen and Parker Quink ink on watercolor paper. Strokes follow a vector field simply driven by the formula atan(x,y). Photo of a lemur I've taken at Parc des Félins (fr).

data.title: Lémurien
data.description: Stippling technique made of 30'000 strokes plotted in 4.5 hours with fountain pen and Parker Quink ink on watercolor paper.
